Joined Mastodon in 2020. Working in finance but would happily retire and enjoy long walks, cooking and being a cat slave. Have enjoyed plenty of travel and have been so damn lucky to have lived in the far East, Hong Kong and Middle East, Kuwait. Love spicy food and enjoy a pint now and again. Proud mother of 2 & grandma to 4. Life needs a good balance and the UK is in an extreme imbalance right now. Not a fan of Tories, Brexit, racists and the terminally stupid. Save our NHS.. #RejoinEU #FBPE
It's too late now. I'll probably never grow up and get a real job. I suppose I will just have to keep making things up and writing them down.
